long_description: tipps und tricks zur zubereitung der verschiedensten pilzsorten erlernst ...einen hofladen und café mit besonderen spezialitäten. manche davon gibt es nur bei uns. ...ein jährliches hoffest mit vielen besuchern und außergewöhnlichen marktständen und aktivitäten.
generated_description: magdeburger pilzmanufaktur is a small, passionate company based in magdeburg, saxony-anhalt, founded in 2005. the company specializes in the cultivation and sale of a variety of fresh mushrooms, including shiitake, oyster, portobello, maitake, pom pom blanc, stinkhorn, goldcap, boletus, and more. in addition to their mushroom products, magdeburger pilzmanufaktur offers free tips on mushroom processing and recipes, a range of unique spices and products made from mushrooms, lectures and events on health, nutrition, and the world of mushrooms, cooking courses, and a farm shop and café with special offerings. the company operates from a former aldi market in the alt-olvenstedt district of magdeburg.
